db:abstract.db:para: QAccessibleTextSelectionEvent signals a change in the text selection of an object.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This class is used with QAccessible::updateAccessibility().

db:section.db:title: QAccessibleTextSelectionEvent::QAccessibleTextSelectionEvent(QObject *object, int start, int end)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new QAccessibleTextSelectionEvent for object. The new selection this event notifies about is from position start to end.

db:section.db:title: int QAccessibleTextSelectionEvent::selectionEnd() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the position of the last selected character.

db:section.db:title: int QAccessibleTextSelectionEvent::selectionStart() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the position of the first selected character.

db:section.db:title: void QAccessibleTextSelectionEvent::setSelection(int start, int end)
db:section.db:para: Sets the selection for this event from position start to end.
